item.description:
Hello all!

I've got to get in shape for a future hike in July, and since it is too nice to go to the gym, I figure I'll continue my efforts with a Blue Hills hike. This will be a hike, not a walk. I'd like to go at a moderate pace.

We'll start on the Quincy side of Blue Hills (parking near Shea rink); picking up the Skyline trail for two to two and a half hours. If everyone is agreeable, maybe we'll hike more. If I end up passing out, please carry me to my car.

Please bring suitable footwear, hiking gear, plenty of water, and a lunch.

Here is a google maps link to the parking area:
http://maps.google.co...

Hope to see you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send my phone # to the 'yes' list.
item.name: Blue Hills, Skyline Trail Hike
